name: "Little House on the Prairie" Online Quiz | Little House On The Prairie | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Michael Landon.

	Michael Landon's given name was Eugene Orowitz.

False.

	Mary was engaged to John Sanderson Jr. at one time.

Linwood Boomer.

	Adam regained his sight in an explosion and became a lawyer.

questions.text: What role did Melissa Gilbert's brother, Jonathan, play?
questions.explanation:
Willie Oleson.

	Willie was played by Jonathan Gilbert.  Jonathan and Melissa also have another sister in acting.  Sara Gilbert played Darlene Conner on "Roseanne".

True.

	They lived together until Laura and Almonzo married.

questions.text: Was Mr. Edwards married before he married Grace?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	His first wife along with his daughter caught fever and passed away.

questions.text: What was the name of the angel Laura met in "The Lord is My Shepherd"?
questions.explanation:
Jonathan.

	When Laura thought she was responsible for her brother's death, she climbed up a mountain and prayed for God to take her and bring her brother back.

questions.text: What was the name of the Olsen's adopted daughter?
questions.explanation:
Nancy.

	Harriet adopted Nancy after Nellie and Percival moved to New York.

questions.text: How many biological children did Laura and Almanzo have?
questions.explanation:
2.

	Rose and a son that died before he was named.

Leslie Landon.

	Leslie Landon is Michael Landon's daughter.
